XI.ii.3.E.9.
b
.
Record of Transfer (Redeposit) of PFOP Funds
The amount of funds transferred (redeposited) to the applicable current appropriation and the date of that action is made a matter of record.  The
Standard Form 1081, Voucher and Schedule of Withdrawals and Credits
, or other document processed by the finance activity authorizing transfer (redeposit) of such funds is placed in the deceased Veteran’s claims folder.
